name: Miles Taylor
role: Chief of Staff at Department of Homeland Security
summary: Former DHS Chief of Staff who wrote the anonymous 'I Am Part of the Resistance Inside the Trump Administration' op-ed and endorsed Joe Biden, calling Trump 'a man without character.'

keyStatements.quote: Donald Trump is a man without character. It's not that he's got a different political philosophy than I have. He's a man without any principle. And that's evident on a daily basis by what he does in this job.
I am convinced that Donald Trump, in a second term, would be even more extreme and more dangerous than he was in the first term.

I witnessed the president berate cabinet secretaries and other senior officials. I heard him question why the U.S. should keep defending Asian allies. I watched him encourage the most divisive policies.

timeline.significance: Warned about Trump from inside (revealed as author in 2020)
Confirmed authorship of NY Times op-ed

timeline.event: Warned Trump would be more dangerous in second term

credibility.background: Former DHS Chief of Staff, author of anonymous resistance op-ed, national security professional
positions: Chief of Staff, Department of Homeland Security (2017-2019)
